messages.text: Thank you to everyone for making my time at HF great

thread_replies.text:
We’re gonna miss you, Troy! :sob: 
It was great working with you. We didn’t get the chance to work directly together but from what I’ve seen and heard you had a positive impact in Good Chop even in the short amount of time the team had with you.
I hope you continue to build cool things and that perhaps you get to come back to HF someday.
I wish you all the best :two_hearts:

Bye Troy! It was very nice working with you
Hope we can work together again.
All the best to you going back to classes :nerdge:

messages.text:
Morning. I generally feel better, but still not healthy enough. :disappointed: 
Did some med tests and got another sick note up to Thursday. Hopefully, the tests won’t show anything serious and I will be back soon!

thread_replies.text: I have macOS Sonoma 14.7.5 :thinking_face:
I am on MacOS Sequoia 15.6.1 and no problems on my end.
@U027201FQSV I'm on 26.0.1 and no issues here
It happens sometime because o the sentinel app that it takes a few minutes for the internet to kick in, but that was even before the updated
Trying to connect for an hour and no success…
I'm on 15.4 rn. I was experiencing similar issues regularly, but it usually took 10-15min. This week however didn't notice it anymore. (I suspect jamf, but who knows :shrug:)

messages.text: hi team, i'm going to be leaving this channel soon :waveboi:  it has been an absolute please working with you all! I moved from HF growth to the everyplate team a bit more than 6 years ago, and it's amazing to see how the website and RN app of a small brand became multi-brand platforms for extremely successful markets and verticals, and how a 10-people team became a 50 people tribe :star2: I'm going to be working on something different, but still part of the bigger Consumer alliance. Please ping me if there's anything I can support you with :hugging_face:
messages.raw_text: hi team, i'm going to be leaving this channel soon :waveboi:  it has been an absolute please working with you all! messages.text: Hey folks, wanted to congratulate @U07VDFEFBQU with 1 year at HF anniversary! :celebrate: Deo has had a long way to arrive fully in Berlin, but I can't be happier that eventually he overcame German paperwork and was able to contribute massively to: Good Chop E-Commerce, Funnel, OTP among a ton of other topics handled throughout the year! Happy to have you onboard! :woo:

<!here> Hey New Ventures Team,

We are looking to get some new swag with updated designs for the team and want to get accurate sizes for our team members across Berlin and Toronto offices. Could everyone submit this one-question survey please <https://forms.gle/RfCcPCZ2yFRk3Nxg8>

For the Canadian folks, im looking to bring these with me mid Dec if they come in time, else we will be bringing them over early 2026

thread_replies.text: qq: Are the sizes unissex?

pls note that if answer is no im taking my dog with me

Yes, so slightly smaller than the sizes NA folks are used to

T-Shirts I'm 95% Medium
yea I would go with L
